title: Why banks need to innovate to bridge credit-deposit gap
description: India's banking sector is experiencing strong profitability and improved asset quality, but lagging deposit growth compared to credit growth presents challenges. Financial shifts, tax issues, and competitive investments are factors. Banks are exploring methods like better rates and special services to attract deposits. The divergence may end by June-October 2025.
